main event: A military airman observed a yellow fireball-like object over Phan Rang Air Base in Vietnam.
interesting points: The object initially appeared similar in size and shape to a football, but grew slightly smaller as it approached.
The object rapidly grew smaller and faded after passing by.
Four other airmen at different locations on the base also confirmed the sighting.
A similar sighting was reported at Cam Ranh Bay around the same time, but that object was described as a slow-moving weather balloon with a light attached.
The Phan Rang control tower and CGA facility had no reported traffic or visual/radar contact at the time of the incident.
